title: Account got reset?
body:
So I haven't actually played the game on my old account for like 4 years, and then today I decided to try going on that account again.  When I got onto the account it brought me to the beginner page area (where it tells you to create a summoner name, etc.), so I assumed that my account got reset.

But then when I search up my old summoner name the account still shows up and exists.. what do I do?

replies.body: I was able to retrieve my account based off of many questions that I had to answer via email! Thanks for all your support guys!

We're happy to help recovering your other account.  The first step I suggest is using our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) just in case you're able to regain access manually.  If you still have issues, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can help!  We'll respond asap!
Yep already sent a ticket yesterday and have not gotten any reply since.
Wait nvm i checked my friends list and I was able to add my old account, but the thing is even if I do have 3 accounts I don't remember the username or the email to it, just the summoner name ;_;

An account won't be reset, don't worry, you probably logged in an old empty smurf that has similar username/password. If you can't remember the precise credentials, contact Player Support [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and give as many details as possible.

Helloo!! I only made two accounts ever though :/  Just this one and my old one.  D:

But then here's another interesting thing, even though I can search up my summoner name, I can't add that account... it's weird.  I sent a ticket though, hopefully it'll work out. The only big problem though is that since the account was from about 4 years ago, I don't really remember much about it  :(
